attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop the fluoridation of all municipal water supplies in the united kingdom

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.

Duplicate: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Anti-fluoride/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
